link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity " Value of Bank's outstanding unsecured guarantees plus total of outstanding unsecured advances as a % of total outstanding advances (in per cent) ( = If 'Total Outstanding Advances' is greater than '0', then ((((Outstanding Unsecured Guarantees)+ (Outstanding Unsecured Advances))/( Total Outstanding Advances))*100) )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Large Exposures to Individual Borrowers- Total ( = This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Large Exposures to Borrower Groups- Total (=This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Large Exposures to Borrower Groups- Total (=This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )" do not tally
Values assertion not satisfied [Loans and Advances to Capital Market should be equal to Loans and Advances to Capital Market - Funded and Loans and Advances to Capital Market - Non-funded]
Identity " Value of Fixed assetes at net ( = Total fixed assts + Capital Work in Progress Leased Assets Net of Provisions)" do not tally.
Identity " Value of Issued capital- Total ( =This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Issued Capital (= No. of Shares multiply by Amount of Each Share )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Subscribed capital- Total ( =This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Subscribed Capital ( = No. of Shares multiply by Amount of Each Share )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Called Up capital- Total ( = This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Called-up Capital ( = No. of Shares multiply by Amount of Each Share )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Calls unpaid- Total ( = This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Calls Unpaid ( = No. of Shares multiply by Amount of Each Share )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Shares forfeited- Total ( =This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )" do not tally
Identity "Value of Aggregate Deposis reported in Consolidated Balance Sheet ( = Aggregate Deposits reported in Financials for the Consolidated Bank )" do not tally

Identity "Value of Assets ( = Cash and Balances with Reserve Bank of India +Balances with banks and money at call and short notice +Investments +Loans & Advances +Fixed Assets +Other Assets+Goodwill on Consolidation+Debit Balance of Profit and Loss A/C. )" do not tally.
Identity " Value of Aggregate borrowings reported in Consolidated Balance Sheet ( = Aggregate borrowings reported in Financials for the Consolidated Bank )" do not tally
Identity "Value of Net profit loss after tax reported in Consolidated Profit and Loss Statement ( = Profit after tax reported in Financials for the Consolidated Bank )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Contingent Liabilities reported in Consolidated Balance Sheet ( = Contingent Liabilities reported in Financials for the Consolidated Bank )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Appropriations ( = Net profit loss after tax + Brought forward consolidated profit and loss attributable to the group )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Minority Interest in Consolidated Balance Sheet ( = Minority Interest In Schedule 2A )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Capital ( Capital= (Called-up Capital (from 'Schedule 1,2,2A'))- (from 'Schedule 1,2,2A')Calls unpaid)+(Forfeited shares ( 'Schedule 1,2,2A')) )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Large Exposures to Individual Borrowers- Total Exposure as % to capital funds ( = This is sum total of dynamically added row to table with Exposure Percentage )" do not tally

Identity " Value of Large Exposures to Borrower Groups- Total Exposure as % to capital funds (= Summation of Total Exposure Percentage reported for all group companies for all the Borrower Groups )" do not tally

Identity " Value of Large Exposures to Borrower Groups- Sub Total Exposure as % to capital funds ( = Summation of Exposure Percentage reported for all group companies under the Borrower Group. )" do not tally
Identity " Value of Assets ( = Capital and Liabilities )" do not tally
Identity " Number of Issued capital- Total ( =This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )" do not tally
Number of Subscribed capital- Total ( =This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )" do not tally
Identity " Number of Called Up capital- Total ( = This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )" do not tally
"Identity "" Number of Calls unpaid ( = This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )"" do not tally"
Identity " Number of Shares forfeited- Total ( =This is sum total of dynamicly added row to table )" do not tally
